channel.title: Rtos on Mobile Robot I/O
channel.description: Recent content in Rtos on Mobile Robot I/O

item.title: The ESP32
item.description: You need to push the RESET button to get them to write flash. A power packed chip that I have just started playing with. Give some quick specs here: and compare with other well known options (arduino’s, stm32 or Raspberry Pi. Quick Feature Recap Coolness beyond the Arduino Some of the interesting things that set this chip apart from the arduino, also pitfalls that come along with this more advanced chip.
